content.question: Research on environmental enrichment and the brain suggests that the environment

choices.label: influences both brain structure and functioning throughout the life span
influences both brain structure and functioning only through infancy
influences both brain structure and functioning only through childhood
influences brain functioning but not brain structure

content.answer: influences both brain structure and functioning throughout the life span

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
